languages.text: Targets affected by {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Captive Audience{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} reduced by −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} is doubled for targets failing the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets affected by {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Captive Audience{/g} have their armour, dodge, and parry reduced by −<u>(10 + AGI bonus)</u>%. This penalty is doubled for targets failing the ability's Toughness resistance test.

Targets affected by Captive Audience have their armour, dodge, and parry reduced by −(10 + AGI bonus)%. The penalty is doubled for the targets that failed the resistance test thus becoming immobilised.

languages.text: Los objetivos afectados por {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Audiencia cautivada{/g} reducen su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} un −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> %. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} se duplica contra los objetivos que fallen la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}囚われの観衆{/g}の影響を受けたターゲットは、戦闘が終了するまで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が−<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%減少する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}は、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると倍になる。

{g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}囚われの観衆{/g}の影響を受けたターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が−<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%減少する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}は、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると倍になる。

languages.text: 受到{g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}意乱神迷{/g}影响的敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}降低<u>（10+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。如果目标未能通过意乱神迷{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}翻倍。

languages.text: Les cibles affectées par {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Auditoire captivé{/g} voient leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} réduites de −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} est doublée pour les cibles qui échouent au {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.

languages.text: Bei Zielen, die mit {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Unfreiwilliges Publikum{/g} belegt sind, werden {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % verringert. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} wird bei Zielen verdoppelt, deren {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} misslingt.

languages.text: У целей, получивших попадание атакой, усиленной способностью {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Зритель поневоле{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} уменьшаются на <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% до конца боя. Если цель проваливает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, которую требует пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, то {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} удваивается.

traits.locale_text: У целей, получивших попадание атакой, усиленной способностью {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Зритель поневоле{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} уменьшаются на <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>%. Если цель проваливает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, которую требует пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, то {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} удваивается.

У целей, получивших попадание атакой, усиленной способностью {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Зритель поневоле{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} уменьшаются на <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>%. languages.text: {g|f:8a3834391538418fa35ad73861da942f}Seyirciyi Esir Et{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisindeki hedeflerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri, %<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar azalır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testini{/g} geçemeyen hedeflerde iki katına çıkar.
